headline: Autodesk (ADSK) Q3 2026 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Billings, non-GAAP operating margin, and free cash flow exceeded our expectations.  As demonstrated at Autodesk University, shared during our recent Investor Day, and reflected in our results today, we are well-positioned to deliver for Autodesk customers and investors even in an uncertain geopolitical, macroeconomic, and technological environment.

summary: Autodesk (ADSK) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +7.23% and +2.67%, respectively, for the quarter ended October 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Autodesk projects quarterly results above estimates on cloud subscription, AI design tools demand
summary: Design software maker Autodesk forecast fourth-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, supported by steady ​subscription renewals and growing demand for its cloud-based design tools. Shares of the ‌San Francisco-based company rose more than 5% in extended trading after it also topped market expectations for ‌third-quarter results. Steady demand trends in data center construction, infrastructure upgrades and industrial building projects have continued to bolster the long-term outlook for companies such as Autodesk.

headline: Autodesk shares surge as AI-powered design firm beats expectations
summary: Investing.com -- Autodesk Inc (NASDAQ:ADSK) reported better-than-expected third-quarter fiscal 2026 results on Tuesday, with both earnings and revenue surpassing analyst estimates, prompting the company to raise its full-year outlook. Shares of the design software maker jumped over 4% in after-hours trading following the announcement.

raw.headline: Autodesk shares surge as AI-powered design firm beats expectations

Shares of the design software maker jumped over 4% in after-hours trading following the announcement.

headline: Autodesk: Fiscal Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The San Francisco-based company said it had profit of $1.60 per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were $2.67 per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Autodesk: Fiscal Q3 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The San Francisco-based company said it had profit of $1.60 per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were $2.67 per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

headline: Autodesk (NASDAQ:ADSK) Beats Q3 CY2025 Sales Expectations
summary: 3D design software company Autodesk (NASDAQ:ADSK) reported Q3 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 18% year on year to $1.85 billion. Guidance for next quarter’s revenue was optimistic at $1.91 billion at the midpoint, 2.6% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.67 per share was 6.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
